name: Space Trader
description:
Simple space trading game I made for Jim Jam 1. 

You can explore the sandbox and trade with space stations and battle pirates.

Notes on controls (to save you from wall of text tutorial at the start):

To get into the game quickly remember the following:

Space toggles the ship controls and W goes forward and the mouse controls the direction you are facing. B brakes and is useful if you end up out of control.

You can also shoot with Left Click.
